lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko says she is "super excited" at the prospect of competing in her first Olympics next month although the women's world number one has decided against living at the Games village in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: World Number One Ko Will Not Be Staying at Olympic Village
headline.main: World Number One Ko Will Not Be Staying at Olympic Village

snippet: Lydia Ko says she is "super excited" at the prospect of competing in her first Olympics next month although the women's world number one has decided against living at the Games village in Rio de Janeiro....
